content.narrative: Jejik cho jejik cho ji nah-'ay?
content.translation: Big moose, big moose what do you see?
content.question: ___ cho ___ cho ji nah-'ay?

content.narrative: Jejik cho jejik cho ji nah-'ay? Detsik shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Big moose, big moose what do you see? I see a baby moose looking at me.
content.question: Jejik cho jejik cho ji nah-'ay? _____ shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Detsik, destsik ji nah-'ay? Wedzey shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Baby moose, baby moose what do you see? I see a caribou looking at me.
content.question: Detsik, destsik ji nah-'ay? ___ shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Wedzey, wedzey ji nah-'ay? Ch'egha shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Caribou, caribou what do you see? I see a baby caribou looking at me.
content.question: ___, ___ ji nah-'ay? Ch'egha shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Ch'egha ch'egha ji nah-ay? Debe shenoh-'ay
content.translation: Baby caribou, baby caribou what do you see? I see a sheep looking at me.
content.question: ___ ch'egha ji nah-ay? Debe shenoh-'ay

content.narrative: Debe, debe ji nah-'ay? Deve ga shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Sheep, sheep what do you see? I see a baby sheep looking at me.
content.question: ____, ____ ji nah-'ay? Deve ga shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Debe ga, debe ga, ji nah-'ay? Shar zray shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Baby sheep, baby sheep, what do you see? I see a black bear looking at me.
content.question: Debe ga, debe ga, ji nah-'ay? ___ zray shenoh-'ay..

content.narrative: Shar zray, shar zray, ji nah-'ay? Shar ga shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Black bear, black bear, what do you see? I see a baby bear looking at me.
content.question: Shar ____, shar ____, ji nah-'ay? Shar ga shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Shar ga, shar ga, ji nah-'ay? Zhur shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Baby bear, baby bear, what do you see? I see a wolf looking at me.
content.question: ___ __, ____ __, ji nah-'ay? Zhur shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Zhur, zhur ji nah-'ay? Zhur ga shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Wolf, wolf, what do you see? I see a baby wolf looking at me.
content.question: ____, ____ ji nah-'ay? Zhur ga shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Zhur ga, zhur ga ji nah-'ay? Gah shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Baby wolf, baby wolf, what do you see? I see a rabbit looking at me.
content.question: Zhur ga, zhur ga ji nah-'ay? ___ shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Gah, gah, ji nah-'ay? Gah zhar shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Rabbit, rabbit what do you see? I see a baby rabbit looking at me.
content.question: Gah, gah, ji nah-'ay? ___ ____ shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Gah zhar, gah zhar, ji nah-'ay? Shetso shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Baby rabbit, baby rabbit, what do you see? I see Grandma looking at me.
content.question: Gah zhar, gah zhar, ji nah-'ay? _____ shenoh-'ay.

content.narrative: Shetso, shetso, ji nah-'ay? Tr'inke-in shenoh-'ay.
content.translation: Grandma, grandma, what do you see? I see children looking back at me.
content.question: Shetso, shetso, ji nah-'ay? __________ shenoh-'ay.

content.translation: Children, children, what do you see?
content.question: Tr'inke-in, tr'inke-in __ ______?
The End:
